doc.title: Console
doc.desc: The Console class is a class that manages the console. You cannot create objects from this class (this class cannot be accessed directly). You can access the object of this class via Debug.console.

member.name: visible
member.shortdesc: Whether it is displayed or not
member.desc: Indicates whether the console is displayed. You can also set the value. If set to true, it will be displayed.
